dcterms:description: The Richmond area dataset is derived from in-roadway speed sensor data combined with workzone data provided by the Virginia Department of Transportation (VDOT). It includes 95 road segments, with data collected from 01/01/2019 to 12/31/2019 at a 15-minute sampling interval, and contains 1896 work zone events across the network.
dcterms:title: Richmond Dataset

dcterms:description: The Tysonâ€™s Corner dataset is proprietary to the Virginia Department of Transportation and is aggregated from the Regional Integrated Transportation Information System (RITIS). It includes 131 road segments, with data collected from 01/01/2019 to 12/31/2019 at a 5-minute sampling interval, and contains 1537 construction work zones within this network.
dcterms:title: Tyson's Dataset
